name: BOR Bag
description:
Receive 100,000 BOR.
Good for weapons and improving facilities!
description_french:
Permet d’obtenir 100 000 BOR.
Utile pour acheter des armes ou améliorer des installations !
description_japanese:
10万BOLもらえます。
武器購入や施設強化ができます！

name: Mana Bag
description:
Receive 50,000 Mana.
Good for using Fusion!
description_french:
Permet d’obtenir 50 000 mana.
Utile pour améliorer des armes !
description_japanese:
5万マナもらえます。
合成で武器の強化ができます！

name: 2x Boost Ticket x 100
description:
Receive a 2x Boost Ticket that lasts for 100 battles.
Double the rate of BOR, Mana, and EXP earned during battle!
Perfect for making quick gains!
description_french:
100 Tickets Boost 100 %.
Pour profiter de 100 % plus de BOR, mana et EXP en combat !
description_japanese:
ブーストチケット100%を100枚もらえます。
戦闘で得られるBOL、マナ、経験値が
100%増加！手早く稼ぎたいときに！

name: 5x Boost Ticket x 100
description:
Receive a 5x Boost Ticket that lasts for 100 battles.
Earn five times the amount of BOR, Mana, and EXP during
battle! Perfect for earning big!
description_french:
100 Tickets Boost 400 %.
Pour profiter de 400 % plus de BOR, mana
et EXP en combat !
description_japanese:
ブーストチケット400%を100枚もらえます。
戦闘で得られるBOL、マナ、経験値が
400%増加！ガンガン稼ぎたいときに！

name: 10x Boost Ticket x 100
description:
Receive a 10x Boost Ticket that lasts for 100 battles.
Earn ten times the amount of BOR, Mana, and EXP during
battle! Maximize your earnings!
description_french:
100 Tickets Boost 900 %.
Pour profiter de 900 % plus de BOR, mana
et EXP en combat !
description_japanese:
ブーストチケット900%を100枚もらえます。
戦闘で得られるBOL、マナ、経験値が
900%増加！稼ぎを極めたいときに！
